Comment: Tachykinin expression was observed by in situ hybridization and immunostaining (Winther et al.
Adult deuterocerebrum DC tachykinin neur.SuperCategory: Adult tachykinin neuron of the central nervous system
Adult deuterocerebrum DC tachykinin neur.Definition: Adult neuron that expresses tachykinin (FBgn0037976) whose cell body is located in the cortex of the anterior deuterocerebrum close to the antennal lobes. There are about 8 pairs of cell bodies per hemisphere (Winther et al., 2003).
